school: Biomedical Sciences School, Chemistry & Molec Biosciences, Medicine Faculty, Biomedical Sciences School, Chemistry & Molec Biosciences,
description: This course will build on the foundation of knowledge established in MEDI7111 and MEDI7112. Students will continue their system-based application of clinically focused medical sciences; using case based learning models supported by a combination of lectures, practical classes, expert tutorials and symposia. This course will include the following modules: Eyes, Endocrinology, Male and Female Health and Development, Skin, Haematology and Mental Health.
